original_text: All the people must obey my rules. They must not do the bad things that the people in Canaan did. If they did them, my people would become unclean. I am the Lord your God.’ All the people must obey my rules. They must not do the bad things that the people in Canaan did. If they did them, my people would become unclean. I am the Lord your God.’
korean_text: 그러므로 너희는 내 명령을 지키고 너희가 들어가기 전에 행하던 가증한 풍속을 하나라도 따름으로 스스로 더럽히지 말라 나는 너희의 하나님 여호와이니라

sentences.original_text: All the people must obey my rules.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람들은 나의 규칙을 지켜야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: They must not do the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나쁜 것들을 해서는 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: that the people in Canaan did.
I am the Lord your God.
